values:
Heron's Spirit Calls To You!
Heron's Wisdom
Includes:
All aspects of diversity
Self-reliance
Boundaries
Exploration
Self-esteem
Balancing multiple tasks
Dignity


If you enjoyed this quiz, please rate and I
may do another!

Animal Spirit Guides ~ Which One Calls To You?
brought to you by Quizilla
Your soul is bound to the Second Totem, Luna:
The Wolf. Luna appears as a pair of coral colored wolves.
She embodies empathy, nurturing, insight,
and warmth. She is associated with the
color coral, the season of spring, and the
element of wind. Her downfall is pathos. You are most compatible with Doves and Ravens.

Which Animal Spirit Totem Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

I feel so embarrassed - he's probably at least 20 and I have a crush on him. The him in question is the owner of the new bookstore in town. Ersatz Books. The owner's name is Cedric. Be still my heart. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/3752.html

You're Element is Earth. You like plants and
flowers and have a very natural looking beauty
so you really don't need make up. You are a
very innocent and maybe naive person but it's
only the jerks in this world that take
advantage of you because you are a jewel in
this world of rocks. You have many friends and
they all enjoy you as much as you do them. You
are skilled with your hands and would be able
to last in a more remote home. (please forgive
me if you cannot see the pics. If you go to my
userpage then you can see your result picture
at the bottom)

What's Your Element(girls)? (PICTURES)
brought to you by Quizilla
Goddess of winter, with a cold exterior but deep
down a warm, caring heart.

What element would you rein over? (For Girls)
brought to you by Quizilla
Your element is Earth. You have your feet on the
ground and are in touch with reality. Some may
say you need to lighten up, but you are just
not that way. It's not that you don't enjoy
having fun, you only find it in more calmer
activities such as writing or reading a book.
But before you have your fun you always make
sure your work is done. You are considered the
reliable one among your friends, you would
never betray anyone just like and are not
influenced on peer-pressure. Friends and family
can always come to you for guidance because you
are wise and smart. You know what is right and
what is wrong and you study hard to become
something big in the future. The bad side is
that your friend/s feel ignored when you spend
more time with books and papers rather with
them. You are not such a people person and are
sometimes a question-mark on how to behave
around them at certain times. Luckily it always
works out, somehow. Love is not really desired
in your world right now, maybe in the future
when you've got a work and so on under control.
After all, you are a perfectionist. Rate and
message!

What is your element? [with pics + 7 outcomes + detailed answeres!]
brought to you by Quizilla
You are ice. You have a cold exterior but a warm
heart.

What element is your soul?
brought to you by Quizilla

okay, I wonder who he is and why he wanted to know when I work. I never had a guy have a crush on me before so this is quite new and unexpected. I just hope that he does like like me and this isn't a joke. I'm a bit new on the romance scene. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/3244.html

Cornelia stopped over and decided she was going to post her answers in my journal and then transfer them over to hers later. Meh. mine:
You are a sunflower sprite! You depend on others a
great deal and hardly ever think for yourself,
but that doesn't mean you have no opinion, when
you are passionate about something, you defend
it to the death!

Which sensational sprite are you? (entrancing pics!)
brought to you by Quizilla Cornelia:
You are a butterfly sprite! You have a deep
connection with the earth and all its
creatures, preferring plants and animals to
people. You love all sorts of flowers and hate
a bare room, this makes you a very bright
bubbly person, who everyone can't help but
love!

Which sensational sprite are you? (entrancing pics!)
brought to you by Quizilla mine:
You are the Spirit of Peace. Purity is your gift,
it sends away anybody with bad intentions,
people just look at you and know that you are
special, you have a sort of angel-like aura
about you that says 'i'm pure'. People just
cannot stay away from you, they want to be like
you and have that same aura, so friends are
easy for you to make, and your gift tells you
whether they are good or not. A partner is just
the same, they have to be of a good heart.

Which stunning spirit of emotion are you? NEW AND IMPROVED! (amazingly beautiful anime pics!)
brought to you by Quizilla Cornelia:
You are the Spirit of Love. You think around
romance and are extremely compassionate.
Whenever you want something you can get it due
to your fiery passion. You can make friends
quite easily, because people are attracted to
your obvious good nature. You will have no
trouble in finding a life partner and will be
very happy.

Which stunning spirit of emotion are you? NEW AND IMPROVED! (amazingly beautiful anime pics!)
brought to you by Quizilla

Your Hidden Power Is Light
Angel


You have a happy yes quite soul. You keep
somethings to yourself and like to be alone but
don't mind showing your bright side to your
friends. You find that hell is the worst of all
since you're an angel from heaven. You use your
powers for the forces of good to protect God's
creatures.

Gem Stone: Canary Diamond, Eye
Color:Golden,Hair Color:Blond that
goes to your shoulders

Quote:In my field of paper flowers And candy clouds of lullaby I lie inside myself for hours And watch my purple sky fly over me

What Is Your True Hidden Power? .::Beautiful Anime Pics::.

thanks to many nights work at the Silver Dragon (if you haven't been - go. The Chinese is to die for, seriously. And I'd be saying that even if I didn't work there. ;)) I've managed to save up enough money in the "Prince Strongheart" fund. I'm going this weekend to go look at goldens retrievers, any of you girls want to come? ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/2478.html

You are Christine Pony! You're the bewildered heroine of the story, a timid
little Flutter Unicorn. (Your father was a
Unicorn and your mother was a Flutter Pony and
your heritage tends to confuse people.) People
see you as ethereal, delicate, and holy, but
really you're just a naive and confused little
Pony wandering around lost in the darkness of a
Gothic tragedy that's too complicated for you
to comprehend. It isn't your fault that your
colouring and your symbol and your wings make
you glaringly symbolic.
Your father promised to send you the Angel of Music
when he reached Heaven, and you pinned all your
hopes on the dream of the Angel's coming, and
the promise that he would help you become the
great opera singer you always wanted to be.
When that Angel turned out to be the Phantom of
the Opera himself, you had a bit of a shock,
but when you learned to love him, you saved his
soul from the darkness it had descended
into.
Being glaringly symbolic has its benefits!

Which Phantom of the Opera My Little Pony Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla
You are one of the few out there whose wings are
truly ANGELIC. Selfless, powerful, and
divine, you are one blessed with a certain
cosmic grace. You are unequalled in
peacefulness, love, and beauty. As a Being of
Light your wings are massive and a soft white
or silver. Countless feathers grace them and
radiate the light within you for all the world
to see. You are a defender, protector, and
caretaker. Comforter of the weak and forgiver
of the wrong, chances are you are taken
advantage of once in awhile, maybe quite often.
But your innocence and wisdom sees the good in
everyone and so this mistreatment does not make
you colder. Merciful to the extreme, you will
try to help misguided souls find themselves and
peace. However not all Angelics allow
themselves to be gotten the better of - the
Seraphim for example will be driven to fighting
for the sake of Justice and protection of those
less powerful. Congratulations - and don't ever
change - the world needs more people like you. Image Copyright Sheila Wolk (prints available
through treefreegreetings.com) - words added by
myself.

*~*~*Claim Your Wings - Pics and Long Answers*~*~*
brought to you by Quizilla
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/2232.html
the images of Corny's dream boy will be going up later - my scanner spazzed on me the other night so I had to uninstall and reinstall it. I *hate* that machine sometimes. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/1888.html

Work was busy the other night - almost too busy, which is good when you think about it. The Silver Dragon is such a nice place and they deserve all the business they can get. And the tips, ah, sweet tips. $90 in tips - nice. All of the tips I get are going into the puppy fund. Yeah, it's official, I'm getting a dog. Can't wait. I figured I could use the company - my place does get rather lonely at night. Besides, Mom and Dad aren't here so they have no say in the matter. ::snicker:: Ah, Cornelia's talked in me into hosting one or two drawings I did of her dream guy. Yeah, that one. She described him - I did some sketching. I have to say he is cute but like I mentioned earlier - he strikes me as my age. And yeah, it's so squicking me out. It's not my problem - but I'll have to deal with it eventually, knowing my luck. ::massages temples:: Someone tell me when did I get appointed "Mother Hen"? ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/1624.html

Pardon me while I vent. I finally got a phone call from my parents. After six weeks of wondering where the hell they were *this* time, they finally decided it was time to let me know. They're not even in the country! Mom said they're in London and that they won't be back for two more months. Gee - how lovely. I'm here in Heatherfield and my parents are in London - and they didn't even bother to ask if I had wanted to go when they left six weeks ago. ::sulks:: I wish they had asked - I really had wanted to see London. Ah, well, there's always next year. I'll be 18 then and I can go to London for school. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/1401.html

I swear, there are days when I want to strangle Cornelia. She's talked me into driving her, Hay Lin, Irma and Elyon to the mall - again. That girl practically lives there. I swear, if I have to go to the mall again in the next three days - I will consider maiming Cornelia. At least, I can find something to do while I'm there. There's a new art store at the mall so I think I might hide in there for a bit. At least until I get bored and venture into another store. Heaven keep me from going all girly girl. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/1136.html

Cornelia's having the dreams again. ::sigh:: It's really starting to annoy me. Whoever that man is has got to stop. I can't stand having to hear her talk about this dream man. If he's real, he better not show when I'm around or I'll kick his ass. She's 14, damn it. And from what she's told me, he sounds about my age. Ugh. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/944.html

I don't see why Cornelia thinks Lilian's a brat. Lilian listens to me - maybe it's because I'm older and I have that no-nonsense attitude. I don't know. I think I might get a dog to keep me company. The house gets lonely at night and it'll be better for my safety. I think I'll get a golden retriever, name it Prince. Would be cute. And such in-joke. Cornelia will probably get it, and hit me for it, but my dog. And I'll name it what I want to name it. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/728.html

Hey, my name's Christine Strongheart. Welcome to my 'journal. Inside you'll find my rants, my hopes, my thoughts, and other assorted randomness for my posts. I live next door to the Hale's and do the occasional stint of babysitting for them. I, ah, live by myself since my parents are out of town - constantly. They occasionally come home but those are few and far between. I don't remember the last time they were home to tell you the honest truth. So I occasionally stay at the Hale's house so I don't feel neglected. Cornelia's been dropping by the house lately, telling me of these dreams she has about this guy from a different world or something along those lines. I worry about her - something feels utterly wrong about that. Anyway, I better run - I need to get my homework done before I go babysit next door. ~Christine
http://healer-witch.livejournal.com/432.html
